info.name: Fighter Battle Master Maneuvers (N1300)
info.description: Additional maneuvers for the Battle Master path.
info.author: Unelith

description.p: As a bonus action, you can try to hit a foe with the handle of your weapon. You expand one SD to try and make an attack that will deal damage equal to the SD + your Strength modifier. If you hit, the target will be dazed for the rest of the turn.
